name: Americano Coffee
details: A coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, chocolate syrup, and whipped cream.

name: Espresso Coffee
details: A strong, concentrated coffee brewed by forcing hot water under pressure through finely ground coffee beans.

name: Black Coffee
details: A creamy coffee made with espresso and steamed milk, topped with a light layer of foam.

name: Iced Coffee
details: Chilled coffee served with ice, offering a refreshing option for coffee lovers during warm weather.

name: Cappuccino
details: A shot of espresso diluted with hot water, creating a coffee with a lighter, milder taste.

name: Nitro Cold Brew
details: Cold brew coffee infused with nitrogen, giving it a smooth, creamy texture and a frothy head.
